Melissa McKnight is a model and actress who hails from England. She is the former spouse of the well-known actor Matt LeBlanc. In spite of the fact that she was born in England, she migrated to the United States when she was very young and eventually obtained dual citizenship. After beginning her career as a model, Melissa went on to become a cover girl for a number of beauty ads and magazines before transitioning into the film industry. In the year 2001, she had her first appearance in the film Triangles and Tribulations. After becoming married to Friends actor Matt LeBlanc, she became even more famous than she was before. Prior to her marriage to him, Melissa had been married to Anthony Esposito, with whom she had two children before the couple divorced. It was through a common friend that she was introduced to Matt LeBlanc in 1997. After dating for a year, LeBlanc made his proposal to her. In May of 2003, the pair ultimately tied the knot in the state of Hawaii. After a year of marriage, the couple became parents to a girl named Marina Pearl LeBlanc.
